column1: Baby Barnaby's////Our waiter was nice. And it's true
column2: you do get free refills of the orange juice. Although I was a little embarrassed to ask for a refill. I wanted a third
column3: but I wasn't about to ask him again. I wished they'd just refill it automatically
column4: but I watched the orange juice machine and it didn't seem like it'd be able to keep up.
